remarks: Version of ~ 2sb6 with a context, and distinct variable conditions replaced with distinctors.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Aug-2019.)
statement:
wl-2sb6d.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. y y = x ) $.
wl-2sb6d.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. y y = w ) $.
wl-2sb6d.3 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. y y = z ) $.
wl-2sb6d.4 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. x x = z ) $.
wl-2sb6d $p |- ( ph -> ( [ z / x ] [ w / y ] ps <-> A. x A. y ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> ps ) ) ) $.
